title: Unable to synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, the synchronization process fails.
OB: The synchronization process for a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) fails.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
